Package A3

Class part1

java.lang.Object
A3.part1
public class part1 extends Object
part1 class defines methods necessary to read files containing book information and processing the information. This class removes books objects with Missing fields, with the wrong amount of fields, and with unknown genres.
Author:
Natha

  • Method Details

    • do_part1

      public void do_part1()
      The do_part1 method implements other methods in the class to create the proper output files.

    • created_files

      public void created_files(String list)
      The method created_files outputs a file containing the output files that will be used read from in the part2 class.
      Parameters:
      list - contains the file name for the file that will be created.

    • getFiles

      public String[] getFiles(String list)
      The getFiles reads a file and saves the names of files found in that file.
      Parameters:
      list - is the name of the input file to be read.
      Returns:
      gives an array of file names that contain information on books.

    • readBooksFile

      public String readBooksFile(String file_name)
      The readBooksFile method takes a file name and reads all book information containe in the file.
      Parameters:
      file_name - is the name of the file to be read.
      Returns:
      gives a string which confirms whether or not the method was successful.

    • process_string

      public String[] process_string(String str, String file_name)
      The process_string method breaks down a line of book information and stores it in an array.
      Parameters:
      str - is the line of book information to be processed.
      file_name - is the name of the file where the line was read.
      Returns:
      gives the array of processed information.

    • validate_and_sort

      public void validate_and_sort()
      The validate and sort method goes through the books array and sorts the books found in it. It then sorts and writes valid books into their files by genre and writes invalid books to the error file.

    • increase_array

      public String[][] increase_array(String[][] array)
      The increase_array method increases the number of rows a 2d String array has.
      Parameters:
      array - contains the array that is to be increased.
      Returns:
      gives the array that has been increased in size.

    • increase_array

      public String[] increase_array(String[] array)
      The increase_array method increases the size of a String array.
      Parameters:
      array - contains the array that is to be increased.
      Returns:
      gives the array that has been increased in size.
